title: What is RP module?
text: The Research Project module at SLIIT is worth 16 credits. Students must complete this module in teams of 4, with each team having a supervisor and a co-supervisor, both SLIIT lecturers.

section.title: What are UN Sustainable Development Goals?
section.content: The UN SDGs are 17 global goals aimed at addressing issues like poverty, inequality, and climate change. In the RP module, each team must focus on a topic related to one of these goals.

section.title: Why Water Board?
section.content: The Water Board Quality Management System supports Clean Water and Sanitation. By monitoring and improving water quality, the system ensures access to safe and clean water, which is essential for public health and environmental protection.
